body.p: GNOME users rejoice! In this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter you'll read about the addition of GNOME 2.4 to x86 stable. There can be some blocking issues if you're making the upgrade from 2.2; read the article to see how you can avoid them. As usual, you'll also find a developer profile (this week we're featuring Donnie Berkholz, XFree herd maintainer and co-lead of the Gentoo Cluster project), community coverage, and a useful tip (would you know how to delete a file named '-foo'?). Enjoy!
